name: product_showcase_4
description: Enhanced product advertisement template for the products

fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with a clean, modern aesthetic. Specify portrait orientation with the product centered and professionally lit, showcasing key features and design elements. Include details about background (transparent or solid), lighting setup, composition, and any specific angles that highlight the product's best features.
fieldPrompt.offer_text: Write a short, attention-grabbing offer text (max 21 characters) that creates urgency and excitement. Examples: 50% OFF, BUY 1 GET 1 FREE, LIMITED STOCK, FLASH SALE. Focus on the key benefit or discount that will motivate customers to act immediately.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your business website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, shop.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance. This will be displayed at the bottom of the image for credibility and traffic generation.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code (e.g., #4A90E2 for blue, #FF6B6B for red) that matches your brand identity or product theme. This color will be used as the background and should create the right emotional response for your target audience.
